name: Return to the Sea
description:
Help the baby sea turtle survive to adulthood by eating jellyfish and avoiding trash.

Use up/down/left/right/ arrow keys to navigate the turtle. 
Eat enough jellyfish to advance to the next level but avoid eating trash. Too much trash and the turtle will die!

Future Updates:

  • - fix turtle movement bug and have turtle icon turn towards direction you are going
  • - minor art fixes
  • - new levels
  • - new obstacles (fishing nets, sharks)
